seo.metaTitle: About Kermit Floor | SPC Flooring, Skirting & Wall Panels Manufacturer
seo.metaDescription: Learn about Kermit Floor, a leading manufacturer of SPC flooring, skirting, and wall panels. Discover our commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainable practices.

hero.title: About Kermit Floor
hero.subtitle: We manufacture SPC flooring, SPC skirting boards and SPC wall panels—designed for durability, fast installation and consistent project results.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.p1: Kermit Floor is a manufacturer focused on SPC-based interior finishing systems: SPC flooring, SPC skirting boards, and SPC wall panels. Our product development is rooted in long-term experience in polymer processing and mold-making, enabling tight control over design details, repeatability and production consistency.
whoWeAre.p2: We build products that are practical for the trade—stable, durable, and easy to work with—while keeping the look clean and modern for residential and commercial environments.

flooring.title: SPC Flooring
flooring.text: Rigid-core flooring systems engineered for everyday durability and a reliable installation outcome across a wide range of interior spaces.

skirting.title: SPC Skirting Boards
skirting.text: Skirting solutions designed to finish the wall–floor junction cleanly. Our skirting boards feature flexible edges to improve the final fit on uneven surfaces.

wallPanels.title: SPC Wall Panels
wallPanels.text: Interior wall panel systems designed for fast installation, impact resistance and consistent decorative results.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer Mindset
manufacturer.text: Consistent production, stable specs, repeatable quality.

design.title: Design Control
design.text: Mold-driven design capability enables detail control and product evolution.

system.title: System Approach
system.text: Flooring + skirting + wall panels designed to work together for a complete finish.

footprint.title: Manufacturing & Supply Footprint
footprint.p1: We operate with a production and supply structure built for both domestic projects and export workflows. Our goal is simple: reliable availability, clear documentation, and predictable results for distributors, contractors and project buyers.
footprint.ctaText: We support distributor/dealer structures and project-based supply. Contact our sales team for product documentation, samples and commercial terms.

sustainability.title: Sustainability & Responsibility
sustainability.p1: We prioritize long service life, practical installation, and responsible manufacturing. Our production is increasingly supported by renewable energy, and we continuously invest in efficient processes that reduce waste and environmental impact. We remain firmly committed to ethical business practices—fair partnerships, transparent operations, and consistent quality standards—so customers can specify Kermit Floor products with confidence.

finalCta.title: Build complete SPC interiors with a manufacturer-backed system.

seo.title: Kermit Floor | Privacy Policy
seo.description: Learn how Kermit Floor collects, uses, and protects your personal data.

section1.title: 1. Who we are (Data Controller)
section1.content:
This website (“Site”) is operated by Kermit Plastik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Şirketi (“Kermit Floor”, “we”, “us”).

  • Data Controller (KVKK): Kermit Plastik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Şirketi
  • Address: Cumhuriyet Mh. Cihan Sk. No:4 ÇAYIROVA / KOCAELİ - TÜRKİYE
  • Contact (privacy): info@kermit.com.tr
  • Phone: +90 262 658 97 29

section2.title: 2. Scope
section2.content:
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect personal data when you:

  • visit the Site,
  • contact us via forms, email, phone, or WhatsApp,
  • request catalogs/technical documents,
  • submit inquiries or RFQs,
  • apply for distributorship/partnership,
  • interact with embedded content (e.g., Instagram), and
  • subscribe to updates (if offered).

section3.title: 3. Personal data we collect
section3.content:
Depending on how you use the Site, we may collect:

A. Data you provide

  • Identity/contact: name, surname, company, title, email, phone
  • Inquiry content: messages, product interests, project details, attachments
  • Commercial details (B2B): company address, VAT/tax number, delivery preferences (if applicable)

B. Data collected automatically

  • Device and usage: IP address, browser type, pages viewed, approximate location (city/country), timestamps, referring URLs
  • Cookies and similar technologies (see Section 8)

C. Data from third parties (limited)

  • Analytics/measurement providers (aggregated usage stats)
  • Social platforms (when you interact with embedded content)

Note: We do not intentionally collect special categories of personal data (sensitive data). Please do not submit sensitive data via Site forms.

section4.title: 4. Purposes of processing
section4.content:
We process personal data for the following purposes:

  1. Responding to inquiries and providing quotations / product information
  2. Customer and relationship management (B2B communications, distributor onboarding)
  3. Providing requested resources (catalogs, technical sheets, installation guides)
  4. Site operation, security, and fraud prevention
  5. Improving the Site (performance, usability, analytics)
  6. Legal compliance (recordkeeping, responding to lawful requests)
  7. Marketing communications (only where permitted/consented; see Section 7)

These purpose disclosures are part of the transparency obligations under KVKK and GDPR.

section5.title: 5. Legal bases (KVKK / GDPR)
section5.content:
We rely on one or more legal grounds depending on the context:

Under KVKK (Law No. 6698):

  • Processing is necessary for the establishment, exercise, or protection of a right (e.g., handling disputes, claims)
  • Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract or pre-contract steps (e.g., preparing a quotation at your request)
  • Processing is necessary for legitimate interests of the data controller (e.g., ensuring Site security), provided fundamental rights are not harmed
  • Explicit consent where required (e.g., non-essential cookies, certain marketing)

KVKK requires that you disclose the collection method and legal reason.

Under GDPR (if applicable):

  • Contract / pre-contract steps
  • Legitimate interests
  • Consent (e.g., non-essential cookies, direct marketing where required)
  • Legal obligation

(Transparency items are derived from GDPR Articles 13/14.)

section6.title: 6. Who we share data with (Recipients / Transfers)
section6.content:
We may share personal data with:

  • IT/hosting providers (e.g., hosting, CDN, website infrastructure)
  • Analytics providers (only as configured; ideally with IP masking and consent where required)
  • Communication tools (email service provider, CRM, customer support tools)
  • Professional advisors (lawyers, accountants) where necessary
  • Authorities / courts where legally required

We do not sell personal data.

International transfers: Your data may be processed in countries other than your own depending on our vendors’ infrastructure. Where required, we use appropriate safeguards (e.g., contractual protections and security measures).

section7.title: 7. Marketing communications
section7.content:
If we offer newsletters or promotional messages:

  • We will send them only with your consent or another lawful basis permitted by applicable law.
  • You can opt out at any time using the unsubscribe link or by emailing info@kermit.com.tr

section8.title: 8. Cookies and similar technologies
section8.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • keep the Site functional,
  • measure usage and improve performance,
  • remember preferences (if enabled),
  • enable embedded content (e.g., social media).

Cookie choices: Where legally required, we present a cookie banner allowing you to accept/reject non-essential cookies. You can also manage cookies via browser settings.

(Optional table—populate with your actual tools)

  • Essential cookies: required for basic functions
  • Analytics cookies: [e.g., Google Analytics] (consent-based where required)
  • Marketing cookies: [if any] (consent-based)

section9.title: 9. Data retention
section9.content: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes listed above, then delete or anonymize it, unless a longer retention period is required by law or necessary for establishing/exercising legal rights (e.g., dispute handling). (Retention disclosure is a GDPR transparency item and good practice under KVKK.)

section10.title: 10. Security
section10.content: We apply reasonable technical and organizational measures designed to protect personal data against unauthorized access, loss, misuse, alteration, or disclosure. However, no system is 100% secure.

section11.title: 11. Your rights (KVKK Art. 11 / GDPR rights where applicable)
section11.content:
Under KVKK, you have rights including (summary): to learn whether your data is processed, request information, learn the purpose and whether it is used accordingly, know third parties to whom data is transferred, request correction/deletion where conditions are met, and object to certain results.

Under GDPR (if applicable) you may have rights such as access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, and objection, and the right to withdraw consent.

section12.title: 12. How to exercise your rights
section12.content:
To submit a request, contact us at:

  • Email: info@kermit.com.tr
  • Postal address: Cumhuriyet Mh. Cihan Sk. No:4 ÇAYIROVA / KOCAELİ - TÜRKİYE

Include sufficient information to verify your identity and clearly describe your request.

We may request additional information to confirm identity and process your request in line with applicable law.

section13.title: 13. Children’s privacy
section13.content: The Site is not directed to children. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children.

section14.title: 14. Changes to this Privacy Policy
section14.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The “Last updated” date will change accordingly. Material changes will be posted on the Site.
